block.p: Dr. Alisa Attie, a daughter of Barbara Attie of Bala Cynwyd, Pa., and the late Dr. Maurice Attie, was married last evening to Dr. Jon Michael Burnham Jr., the son of Miriam Burnham and Mr. Burnham Sr. of Scarsdale, N.Y. Rabbi Daniel Wolk performed the ceremony at Philadelphia Cricket Club in Chestnut Hill, Pa.

The bride and the bridegroom, both 29, recently completed residencies in pediatrics at the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. Next month she is to become a staff doctor in the neonatal intensive care unit of Children's Hospital, where he is to begin a fellowship in general pediatrics and rheumatology.

Rabbi Daniel Wolk performed the ceremony at Philadelphia Cricket Club in Chestnut Hill, Pa.

The bride and the bridegroom, both 29, recently completed residencies in pediatrics at the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. Next month she is to become a staff doctor in the neonatal intensive care unit of Children's Hospital, where he is to begin a fellowship in general pediatrics and rheumatology.
The bride, a graduate of Wesleyan University, and the bridegroom, who graduated cum laude from Dartmouth College, received medical degrees from the University of Pennsylvania.
The bride's father was an endocrinologist at the Hospital of the University of Pennsylvania. Her mother is an independent filmmaker.
The bridegroom is known as Sandy. His father is the chairman and the chief executive of Burnham Securities, an investment bank in New York.
